original: Jacobsson, Gunnar Fridleif Andreas, fil. lic., universitetslektor, Göteborg, f. 22/12/18 i Lysekil av bryggmäst. Carl T. o. Ewa Hallbäck. — Fil. kand. 39, fil. mag. 42, fil. lic. 44. Res. t. TyskL 36, Polen 38 o. Frankr. 46. Lektor i ryska språket v. Gbgs högsk. sed. 44. Ski-.: Sv.-pod’skt o. pofek-^sv. parllörtlexi-kon (tills. m. Jözef Trypucko 46).
translated: Jacobsson, Gunnar Fridleif Andreas, Bachelor of Philosophy, university lecturer, Gothenburg, born on 22/12/18 in Lysekil to brewmaster Carl T. and Ewa Hallbäck. - Bachelor of Philosophy 39, Magister of Philosophy 42, Licentiate of Philosophy 44. Studied abroad in Germany in 36, Poland in 38, and France in 46. Lecturer in the Russian language at Gothenburg University since 44. Published works: Swedish-Polish dictionary and pocket dictionary of parliamentary language (together with Jözef Trypucko in 46).

structured.name: Gunnar Fridleif Andreas Jacobsson
structured.description: Gunnar Fridleif Andreas Jacobsson was a Swedish university lecturer born on 22/12/18 in Lysekil, Sweden. He obtained his Bachelor, Magister, and Licentiate of Philosophy degrees. Gunnar lectured in the Russian language at Gothenburg University since 1944. He also published works such as the Swedish-Polish dictionary and the pocket dictionary of parliamentary language in 1946.
